name: sfchronicle
text: Update: Four people injured in a freeway shooting on I-580 in Oakland this afternoon. All eastbound lanes were shut down for several hours, with lanes reopening around 7:30 p.m. No information on the victims or the suspect vehicle was available. https://t.co/JwpcUEjd9x

name: sfchronicle
text:
Some members of the school board questioned Superintendent Stella Kemp‚Äôs decision to hold an in-person meeting.
